briefDescription: Aggregate type representing a thread on a gpu.
detailedDescription:
Aggregate type representing a thread on a gpu, where a "thread" is a gpu queue.
A gpu queue is like a thread, in that commands send to the gpu will run on a single queue, and queues can execute commands in parallel.

items.name: program_manager_count
items.briefDescription: The amount of [[gpu_program_manager]] currently on the thread.
items.detailedDescription: The amount of [[gpu_program_manager]] currently on the thread.

items.name: queue
items.briefDescription: Represents the VkQueue representing the gpu queue.
items.detailedDescription:
Represents the VkQueue representing the gpu queue.
This reveals a lower level of abstractions, and so should rarely be used.
